Movie House

Intro

In this web application, users can search movies, browse trending movies, comment on movies and collect movies to dashboard. User has to sign in to enjoy the full features.

Sign in/up with verifications

Verifications on duplicated username, password correctness, empty input fields and user's birthday are processed in the server side. Other easy verifications like password confirmation, password length are processed in the client side.

Manage your movies in dashboard

Movie appears in your dashboard when you like it or wish-list it. In dashboard, movies are categorized by their genres. Also the dashboard page is responsive.

Browse movie detail and leave a comment

In detail page, user can like a movie, add a movie to wish list, leave a comment, like/unlike a comment and comment on a comment. Each user is only allowed to modify and delete his/her own comment.

Search and browse popular movies

In the search page, user can perform live search based on movie name and sort the results based on release date. In the trending page in which the layout is similar to the dashboard, user can browse popular movies.
